item.title: First day of class
item.description: As part of the fallout from the Merced Station housing crisis, campus has delayed synchronous class meetings until August 30. For our class, this means we’re missing the first day. We’ll try to make up for this lost meeting by moving a little faster than planned through the first few weeks. Please be ready to hit the ground running when we meet for the first time next Tuesday, August 31:
